headline: Ducks Prevail, but Their Shift to a More Bruising Style Takes Its Lumps
abstract: The Ducks managed to win with only 204 yards in total offense — the fewest by a team in the Rose Bowl since 1979.
lead_paragraph: PASADENA, Calif. — If it was not exactly a decisive moment in the 106th Rose Bowl game, it was nevertheless a moment for which these Oregon Ducks had been built.
